title: Drama Research
selftext:
Greetings everyone,

My name is Shruti R K and I'm conducting a research on 'THE EFFECTS OF WATCHING ONLINE DRAMAS ON INDIAN ADULTS'.
I would be very grateful if you could fill the form and also forward it to your friends, siblings or colleagues to fill it.

Inclusion Criteria:
1) Indian resident above 18 years of age
2) Must watch Korean Dramas. 

Thank you for filling the form üôèüíõ
